Define Documentation

#define GROW( _v, _t )
 

Value:

    if (_v == NULL) \
    { \
        _v ## Available = CHUNK; \
        _v = (_t *) malloc(sizeof(_t)*_v ## Available); \
    } \
    else \
    if (_v ## Count >= _v ## Available) \
    { \
        _v ## Available *= 2; \
        _v = (_t *) realloc(_v, sizeof(_t)*_v ## Available); \
    }
